cause.description:
Marilyn Manson is the most amazing man ever!! He has been making amazing music for over 15 years. He is from Canton Ohio and was born January 4th 1969 to Barb and Hugh Warner. His real name is Brian Warner and is an only child but had a very close relationship with his cousin Chad.
1. He is sexy as hell
2. He makes amazing music
3. He is a satanist
cause.mission: Make him known to everyone around the world!!
cause.name: Marilyn Manson Is My God!!
